ygData.subject: Wizard spells in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry all I must be dumb or something, but although I found 2 wizard guildmasters in the magic user area in Freeport, I cannot find the vendor that sells level
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry all I must be dumb or something, but although I found 2 wizard
guildmasters in the magic user area in Freeport, I cannot find the vendor
that sells level 8 wizard spells. I explored the area around the floating
building, and on the inside I have looked in the downstairs area and the
upstairs. Can anyone confirm / deny that these spells are actually sold in
Freeport and if so give me a general location of the vendor? Are there
other areas in the building that I am not seeing? Thanks.

-Solric
